General.Name: Guangbo Group Stock Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangbo Group Stock Co., Ltd., through its subsidiaries, engages in the development, production, import, sale, and export of office stationery, printing paper products, and plastic products in China. It also provides internet advertising marketing and services. In addition, the company engages in wholesale and retail trade, e-commerce, navigation website advertising, information flow advertising agency, and other internet marketing business; sale of company brochures, photo albums, and other paper products; and development and sale of art painting materials and children's educational stationery. The company also exports its products to Europe, the America, Southeast Asia, and internationally. Guangbo Group Stock Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Ningbo, China.
General.Address: Chehe Guangbo Industrial Park, Ningbo, China, 315155
